Warm safe space, recipe bags, activities, hot food. **NEW** 🧡Toasty Tuesday🧡We are cracking out the board games and crafts for you to enjoy so if anyone fancy teaching me Chess that would be brill♟♟♟
Please feel free to bring your books, laptops whatever you fancy💙
Tuesdays lunch is healthy Jacket Potatoes🙌
(A small donation towards lunch would be fab)
